subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: The Warriors, angry after losing Games 2 and 3, unearthed more than enough offense for a 103-82 victory, tying the series at two games each with Game 5 set for Sunday in California.
snippet: The Warriors, angry after losing Games 2 and 3, unearthed more than enough offense for a 103-82 victory, tying the series at two games each with Game 5 set for Sunday in California.
